metadata.title: CVE-2024-40959 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:xfrm6: check ip6_dst_idev() return value in xfrm6_get_saddr()ip6_dst_idev() can return NULL, xfrm6_get_saddr()
